property.name: text
property.value: A model that simulates a simple chase scenario, where one robot estimates the location of a moving intruder and moves to the estimated location. The robot optimizes its future path as long as "predict_Timehorizon". As the time horizon become longer, the robot tends to go to the future location of the intruder and its trajectory becomes shorter.

property.name: text
property.value: Model motion where the orientation changes at a constant rate and the speed is fixed.

property.name: text
property.value: Number of Perticles used in ParticleFilter (in the distributed version).

property.name: text
property.value: Constraints of speed (used in the distributed version).

property.name: text
property.value: Input values from Central Computation Node. (Array of velocities for all robots.)

property.name: text
property.value: Robot motion depending on the velocity input.

property.name: text
property.value: Model of sensor on the robot. Measuring the 2D position of the intruder.

property.name: text
property.value: Measuring the current position of this robot.

entity.name: CompositeOptimizerUsingGradient
entity.doc: Optimize the objective function provided in the inside composite, subject to constraints and precision/iteration limits

svg.text: Provide a model that computes f(x) from x where f(x) is the term to be minimized. Also provide a model to compute g(x) from x, where the constraints on the minimization are g(x) >= 0.

property.name: text
property.value: State variables of the robot and the target.
